department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Health Canada, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of various gases including delivery, recovery and location of the gas cylinders, located in Longueuil (Quèbec), as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirements.
tags: Public Works and Government Service Canada (PWGSC)
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Contract title:
Acquisition of Gas Cylinders
### RFP Reference:
WS4399511848-Doc4399568421
### RFP Status:
EXPIRED
### Procurement Category:
Goods and Services
### Procurement Method:
Competitive - Open Bidding
### Agreement Type:
Trade Agreement
### Notice Type:
Request for Proposal
### Description:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Health Canada, invites qualified vendors to participate in a competitive bidding process for the procurement of various gas cylinders. The contract is to be carried out in Longueuil, Québec, and delivery of goods is expected by July 6, 2024. 

Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
Contract start date: None
Expected Contract End date: July 6, 2024
Regions of Delivery: Longueuil
Country of Delivery: Canada
